title: 103_hr4104
content:
The "Miscellaneous Tariff Act of 1993" is referenced in terms of amendments to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. A new heading for 2-Nitrobenzenesulfonyl Chloride is added in Subchapter II of chapter 99. SEC. 3. BETA NAPHTHOL.

    A new heading for Beta Naphthol is added in Subchapter II of chapter 99. 

SEC. 4. NEVILLE AND WINTER ACID.

    New headings for Neville and Winter Acid are inserted in numerical sequence in Subchapter II of chapter 99. SEC. 5. ORTHANILIC ACID. 9902.31.14 4-Hydroxy-1-naphthalenesul-fonic acid, monopotassium salt (CAS No. 37860-62-1) and 9902.31.15 2-Naphthol-3,6-disulfonic acid, disodium salt (CAS Nos. 148-75-4 and 135-51-3) are provided for in subheading 2908.20.20 and 2908.20.10 respectively, with no changes before 12/31/95. SEC. 5. ORTHANILIC ACID. 9902.31.16 o-Aminobenzene-sulfonic acid (Orthanilic acid) (CAS No. 88-21-1) provided for in subheading 2921.42.20. SEC. 6. 2,5-DICHLOROANILINE. 9902.31.17 2,5-Dichloroaniline (CAS No. 95-82-9) provided for in subheading 2921.42.20. SEC. 7. 2,5-DICHLOROANILINE-4-SULFONIC ACID. SEC. 7. 2,5-DICHLOROANILINE-4-SULFONIC ACID. Subchapter II of chapter 99 is amended to include 2,5-Dichloroaniline-4-sulfonic acid, monosodium salt. SEC. 8. 2,6-DICHLORO-4-NITROANILINE. Subchapter II of chapter 99 is amended to include 2,6-Dichloro-4-nitroaniline. 2,6-Dichloro-4-nitroaniline (CAS No. 99-3000) is included in subheading 12. The subheading includes 2,6-Dichloro-4-nitroaniline (CAS No. 99-3000) as a free item. SEC. 9. 6-Amino-1-naphthol-3-sulfonic acid (CAS No. 87-02-5) provided for in subheading 2921.21.10, free until 12/31/95.
SEC. 10. 2,4-Dimethoxy-aniline (CAS No. 2735-04-8) provided for in subheading 2922.29.20, free until 12/31/95.
SEC. 11. 4'-Amino-N-methylacetanilide. SEC. 11. 4'-Amino-N-methylacetanilide is provided for in subheading 2924.29.09, free until 12/31/95. SEC. 13. P-AMINOAZOBENZENEDISULFONIC ACID AND ITS SALTS. Subchapter II of chapter 99 is amended to include p-Aminoazo-benzenedi-sulfonic acid, monosodium salt and p-aminoazoben-zenedisulfonic acid, disodium salt. SEC. 14. P-AMINOAZOBENZENE. SEC. 14. P-AMINOAZOBENZENE. Subchapter II of chapter 99 is amended to include p-Aminoazo-benzene. SEC. 15. P-AMINOAZOBENZENE HYDROCHLORIDE. Subchapter II of chapter 99 is amended to include p-Aminoazo-benzene hydrochloride. SEC. 16. 2,2-DINITRODIPHENYL DISULFIDE. SEC. 16 introduces 2,2-Dinitrodiphenyl disulfide under subchapter II of chapter 99. SEC. 18 introduces 1-(p-Sulfophenyl)-3-methyl-5-pyrazolone (CAS No. 89-36-1) under subchapter II of chapter 99, with a provision for it in subheading 2933.19.42. It is classified under heading 9902.31.31 and is duty-free until 12/31/95. SEC. 19 introduces 2-Aminothiazole (CAS No. 96-50-4) under subchapter II of chapter 99, with a provision for it in subheading 2934.10.50. It is classified under heading 9902.31.32 and is duty-free until 12/31/95. SEC. 20 introduces 2-Amino-6-nitrobenzothiazole (CAS No. 6285-57-0) under subchapter II of chapter 99, with a provision for it in subheading 2934.20.50. It is classified under heading 9902.31.33 and is duty-free until 12/31/95. SEC. 21 introduces 2-Amino-5,6-dichlorobenzothiazole. SEC. 22 introduces mixtures of (3,4-dihydroxyphenyl)(2,4,6-trihydroxyphenyl-methanone 2-(2,4-dihydroxyphenyl)-3,5,7-trihydroxy-4H-1-benzopyran-4-one. Mixtures of (3,4-dihydroxy-phenyl)(2,4,6-trihydroxy-phenyl)-methanone and 2-(2,4-dihydroxy-phenyl)-3,5,7-trihydroxy-4H-1-benzopyran-4-one (CAS No. 519-34-6) provided for in subheading 3823.90.29. The amendments made by this Act apply to goods entered on or after the 15th day after the enactment date.
